name: Bratz Total Fashion Makeover
description:
The Bratz are back! Join Cloe, Sasha, Yasmin and Jade in an all-new mobile game experience!
Choose highly fashionable clothes, hairstyles, makeup, and even furniture as you become a social media star! Deal with dramatic characters like the Tweevils and work with the iconic Bratz cast to rise through the ranks of the fashion world. Play fun, challenging match 3 puzzles and earn Bratz Bucks to help buy that perfect look!

CHOOSE from lots of fashionable clothes to create the perfect look!

MAKEOVER your life!

DECORATE your room as well as your appearance!

DRAMA is everywhere, be ready to meet some wild personalities!

SOLVE addictive puzzles with challenging obstacles!

STYLIZE your avatar to stand out on the red carpet!

BLAST through levels with exciting power-ups with explosive benefits!

- By downloading this game you agree to our Privacy Policy and Terms of Use. To learn more, please visit:
https://bratztotalfashionmakeover.com/privacy-policy/
https://bratztotalfashionmakeover.com/term-of-use/
